subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis finished the three-week, 2,267-mile Tour de France 57 seconds ahead of  his former teammate Oscar Pereiro of Spain.
snippet: Floyd Landis finished the three-week, 2,267-mile Tour de France 57 seconds ahead of  his former teammate Oscar Pereiro of Spain.
